summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.0°C) and outside temperature (down 2.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1428 m), feels like temperature (up 6.0°C), and outside temperature (up 4.3°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 728.4m lower than yesterday, 569.2m lower than the past week, 1427.8m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1258.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Chance of light rain, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and the light is absent. Weather could become unsettled.
